title: Woman Sues Daughter For Rs 1.45 Lakh For Breaking Her Bed After A Night Of 'Intense Passion'!
text:
There are those helpful friends who let their houses or apartments be used by their friends to do some ‘wild’ stuff and then there is this mother who has sued her own daughter for breaking her bed after having sex on it.

Nicole is demanding her daughter Rhiannon pay £1,600 (approx Rs 1,45,000) for breaking her bed after a night of "intense passion". The daughter reportedly said she could not afford to pay the amount to her mother, post which the latter dragged her to an Australian TV court show called Trial By Kyle.

Channel 10

On the show, this was Nicole’s reported opening statement, “My partner and I went away for a week and Rhiannon was house sitting for us.I said that she could have the spare room which has a nice queen size bed in it. Nothing wrong with it."

“When we returned the house was a mess, and when I went upstairs to my bedroom, I discovered that my bed was broken. I felt very violated by the fact that she broke it and didn’t actually care that she broke it.”

In the video that is going viral, Rhiannon said that she broke the bed owing to "intense passion". And when Kyle asked her, “Why didn’t you bang in the other bed?” said said, “The honest truth, my other friends were in that bed.”





The case was ruled in Nicole’s favor and Kyle said, “Rhiannon, really, you’re responsible for breaking your mother’s bed, so the ruling is $2099 so your mum can consummate her future relationship in her own bed."

Well, this just gives us a lesson to not go too wild on a bed that costs lakhs.
